caption: Figure 1: Overview of Document Parsing Methodology.
description: The figure presents a flowchart illustrating the methodology of document parsing, categorized into modular pipeline systems and end-to-end approaches using large vision-language models.

caption: Figure 2: Two Methodology of Document Parsing
description: The figure illustrates the two main methodologies of document parsing: the modular pipeline system and the end-to-end approach based on large vision-language models.

caption: Figure 3: Overview of the DLA Algorithm
description: The figure illustrates the two main approaches to document layout analysis: physical layout analysis and logical layout analysis, detailing their respective methods and the integration of visual, semantic, and position features.

caption: Figure 1: Overview of Document Parsing Methodology.
description: The figure illustrates the modular pipeline system and end-to-end approach based on large vision-language models for document parsing.

caption: Figure 6: Overview of the Table Detection and Recognition
description: This figure illustrates the two main methodologies for table structure recognition: row and column segmentation and cell-based approaches.

caption: Figure 7: Overview of the Chart-related Tasks in Document
description: The figure illustrates the different subtasks involved in chart perception, including chart classification, element detection, data and structure extraction, and correlation matching between text and visual elements.
